content.name: capabilityProfile
content.description: An object representing VASA 2.0 SPBM capability profile. Capability profiles can be queried, created, modified and deleted via the REST API. Capability profiles can then be queried via VASA 2.0 API by vSphere environment and leveraged for policy based provisioning of virtual volumes.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the capability profile.

attributes.name: vmwareUUID
attributes.description: Automatically generated unique identifier of the capability profile exposed via VASA 2.0 protocol. It will conform to RFC 3151 section 1.1.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the capability profile.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Capability profile description.

attributes.name: pool
attributes.description: The storage pool the capability profile is associated with.

attributes.name: createdBy
attributes.description: User identifier for the original author of the capability profile.

attributes.name: creationTime
attributes.description: Creation time of the capability profile.

attributes.name: modifiedBy
attributes.description: User identifier for the most recent editor of the capability profile.

attributes.name: modificationTime
attributes.description: Most recent edit time of the capability profile.

attributes.name: generationId
attributes.description: Revision number incremented with every change to the capability profile.

attributes.name: constraints
attributes.description: Constrained values for capabilities included in the profile.

attributes.name: driveTypes
attributes.description: Supported drive types for the capability profile.

attributes.name: fastCacheStates
attributes.description: Supported fast cache states for the capability profile.

attributes.name: raidTypes
attributes.description: Supported RAID types for the capability profile.

attributes.name: spaceEfficiencies
attributes.description: Supported space efficiency choices for the capability profile.

attributes.name: tieringPolicies
attributes.description: Supported tiering policies for the capability profile.

attributes.name: serviceLevels
attributes.description: Supported service level for the capability profile.

attributes.name: usageTags
attributes.description: Associated usage tags for the capability profile.

attributes.name: inUse
attributes.description: Whether any virtual volumes have been created using this capability profile.

attributes.name: health
attributes.description: Health information for the capability profile, as defined by the health resource type.

attributes.name: virtualVolumes
attributes.description: The virtualVolumes associated with the current capabilityProfile
